subject: Re: [junit] is there any way to stop the exection of the Junit Test programatically
msgSnippet: In some cases, yes.  Two questions: 1) Are you using the JUnit 3 runner or JUnit 4 runner? 2) Do you want to stop the execution from inside a test class, or
messageBody:
In some cases, yes. Two questions:

1) Are you using the JUnit 3 runner or JUnit 4 runner?
2) Do you want to stop the execution from inside a test class, or
using an outside interface/GUI?

David Saff

On Mon, Feb 28, 2011 at 2:47 AM, gaurangnshah <gaurangnshah@...> wrote:
> Hi folks,
